What kind of monster does that make you? How could you let yourself get so low? I thought we were friends, supposed to be able to hang out, laugh together. But you never did anything for me. You're supposed to care about other people, but all I got was an empty promise. Now I'm left wondering if there ever was a chance for us to start again, or if it was all just a lie from the beginning. This isn't fair; you're supposed to be different. But you're not. You're exactly as I imagined‚Äîcold, unfeeling, and unworthy of friendship. Why would anyone want to spend time with someone like that? Maybe I deserved better, maybe I was foolish to think otherwise. But still, it hurts to see everything fall apart like this. It feels like I'm losing something important, something that really mattered to me.
